title: I'm told that the file doesn't exist when I try and choose a file path for my installer.

replies.body: You might have some overzealous security settings not allowing files to be read.  Try running the installer as admin, and run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Could you go more into detail about this? Provide a screenshot if you don't mind.
